channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Republicans urge US universities to cut ties with ‘nefarious’ Chinese-backed scholarship program
item.description: House Republicans are urging seven U.S. universities to cut ties with a Chinese scholarship program that lawmakers call a “nefarious mechanism” to steal technology for the Chinese government.

item.title: Harrowing stories of rescue emerge from Texas floods as crews search for over 160 reported missing
How Americans think the government should respond to natural disasters, according to recent polls
